sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_sow_inc.SOWIncidentRouteUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point sn_sow_record.SOWRouteUtil</description>
        <name>SOWIncidentRouteUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SOWIncidentRouteUtil = Class.create();
    SOWIncidentRouteUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(sn_sow.SOWDefaultRecordRouteUtil, {
        PLUGINS: {
            INVESTIGATION_FWK: "com.snc.sn_invest_fwk"
        },
        INVESTIGATE: {
            "route": "investigate",
            "fields": {
                "show": true
            },
            "label": gs.getMessage("Investigation"),
            "options": {}
        },
        initialize: function() {},
        handles: function(table, sysId) {
            return table === "incident";
        },
        getOtherRoutes: function(table, sysId) {
            // for investigation route
            if(sysId == "-1") return;
			
            var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
            if(gr.get(sysId) && gr.isValidRecord() && gr.cmdb_ci == "" && !gr.active) return;
			
            if(!GlidePluginManager.isActive(this.PLUGINS.INVESTIGATION_FWK)) return;
			
            if(new sn_sow.SOWInvestigateConfig().isAnyProviderIntegrated())
                return this.RESULT.routes.push(this.INVESTIGATE);
        },
        type: 'SOWIncidentRouteUtil'
    });]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-05-06 08:41:54</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>38f9ad2597570110669dfe8c1253af8f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SOWIncidentRouteUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Incident Management for Service Operations Workspace" source="sn_sow_inc">49aff4bb733320103e366238edf6a70f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Incident Management for Service Operations Workspace">49aff4bb733320103e366238edf6a70f</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_38f9ad2597570110669dfe8c1253af8f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-11 12:10:55</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
